thread.title: Fla. man gets 885 years for ‘massive amounts’ of child porn
thread.title_full: Fla. man gets 885 years for ‘massive amounts’ of child porn - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Fla. man gets 885 years for ‘massive amounts’ of child porn
text:
Florida State Attorney General Florida man Shawn Ryan Thomas, 31, was sentanced Monday to 885 years for possession of child porn, prosecutors said. The Longwood resident may get additional time on his other charges of attempted kidnapping, attempted child rape and attempted murder. A Florida man got 885 years in prison for child porn on Monday, and he may be facing additional time behind bars, officials said.
Shawn Ryan Thomas, 31, got the steep sentence for having “massive amounts of child pornography,” officials in state Attorney General Pam Bondi’s office said. Yet he’s also slated to go to trial on separate charges of attempted kidnapping, attempted child rape and attempted murder.
Thomas is accused of trying to lure the family of a 9-year-old girl to his Orlando-area home to kill her parents, rape the girl on video and then kill her, the Orlando Sentinel reported .
Investigators with the Florida Department of Law Enforcement caught wind of the plot and arrested him in June 2014.
Then they discovered 60 child porn files, including videos up to an hour long, on a computer in his Longwood home, according to court documents cited by the Sentinel. A lawyer for Thomas maintained the computer was his roommate’s.
A jury nonetheless convicted Thomas for 60 counts of possession of child pornography in June. Seminole County judge Marlene Alva gave him 15 years for each of 59 counts and 15 years of sex offender probation for the last count.
